## JsPlumbInstance.\_internal\_newEndpoint() method

Internal method to create an Endpoint from the given options, perhaps with the given id. Do not use this method as a consumer of the API. If you wish to add an Endpoint to some element, use `addEndpoint` instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
_internal_newEndpoint(params: InternalEndpointOptions<T["E"]>): Endpoint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [InternalEndpointOptions](./core.internalendpointoptions)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; | Options for the Endpoint.  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Endpoint](./core.endpoint)
